resources.string: %1$s and %2$s background apps can be clean up
Some app background process has been cleaned
Content has been copied to clipboard
Uninstall/Clear %1$s app data has been prevented
Smart freeze: %1$s is enabled on Launch request
Your custom Allow list, will exclude these apps in all feature page app list
Do you want to keep it\'s core data? the whole data will be removed if you don\'t want to keep it.

Thanox may come from untrusted installations, Pro versions are only available in the Google play store, and should not be installed from any other source. \n\nNote: Untrusted installations can cause devices to become abnormally stuck, configuration data loss!!!
Which activation method do you prefer?
When the screen is locked, the already unlocked apps will be re-locked.
When a task of an app is removed, such as when the app is cleared from the recent tasks page, the app will be re-locked.
When an already unlocked app goes to the background, the app will be re-locked.
Activity in Allow list will not be locked
Please remember your password. Once set, the password cannot be recovered.
Before enabling the app lock, please go to the system security settings and complete the setup of face recognition, fingerprint, PIN, or pattern password.

resources.string: Deny permissions and do not ask again
Grant permission but ignore operations or return empty data
For rooted devices, requires Magisk or LSPosed framework; LSPosed mode provides the most features, while Magisk mode has relatively fewer features.
For non-rooted devices, requires Shizuku and selecting Thanox within Shizuku; Note: Due to system permission restrictions, the Shizuku mode has very limited features.
This feature is an experimental feature and is not yet stable. It is recommended that you back up your data before enabling this feature to prevent data loss due to unexpected bugs.
Network unavailable, Please check your internet connection.
Server error, Please try again later.

Thanox use Android API to disable components, which means the disabled components will keep it\'s state even if thanox is uninstalled.\n\nThanox will prevent disabled composed from being enable by their host app, and you will see a badge [disabled-by-thanox] on these components.
Add to App lock allow list
Please enter or select a valid filename
Show app info on Toast view

Has a legacy (non-isolated) view of storage
Read the device identifiers (IMEI / MEID, IMSI, SIM / Build serial)
Query other installed package info by package name
Query intent(LAUNCHER, usually used to query installed apps) activities
Receive sensor event, remember select target app in scoped Xposed framework

resources.string: Perform custom actions if match given condition

The engine is a tool for publishing facts. Thanox has multiple publishers enabled by default. The following engines support turning on or off. Please pay attention to the engine description, shutting down the engine may cause some profiles to not be triggered or executed normally
Supports performing automatic clicks and find views. \n\n📢 Note: This engine may cause some app accessibility service to not work
Publish facts of push message arrival

Enable su API support for Thanox profile. please click Allow in the pop-up super permission grant request. If no request is received, please manually turn on the super user permission. \nsu command will be executed as Thanox application. \nPlease allow Thanox app to start in background
You can change default su path by input the custom su path
This profile may not work since su API support not enabled, please go to Engine Settings to enable it
This profile may not work since Push Message Engine not enabled, please go to Engine Settings to enable it
This profile may not work since below global var is missing, you need to create these vars.\n%s
This profile may call Thread.sleep, which may block the execution of other profiles; please adjust the priority of this profile to a negative number so that it will be executed in a new thread.
Create a launcher shortcut, when this shortcut launched, thanox will publish a fact with the shortcut fact value
Schedule some repeating or timed tasks
Tag is for condition check. \nExample of use: %s
Save success, you can enable it

The name field should use alphanumeric combinations as much as possible, and no special characters should appear; \n\nany characters can be used in the description field, just briefly introduce the purpose of this scenario
You may install wechat app from Google play store
No not send push notification if target app is running
Start app process if target app is not running
Please note that the collection function is currently in the experimental stage and is only for learning and research. At present, no one can guarantee that the push will be 100% received.

Thanox support both Xposed and Magisk.

 For Xposed user (Xposed module and Magisk zip can not be used at the same time), you can just select and check Thanox in Xposed app module config page. 

For Magisk user, you can rename downloaded Thanox apk from .apk to .zip and then install in Magisk manager, or if you can not find the downloaded apk, you can go to Settings, About, Patch status to export the patch
There is an error at the Thanox framework. Please report the logs under /data/system/thanos_xxx/log to the developer.
You only needs to apply one patch to active Thanox, but you apply multiple patches at the same time: %s, be sure to read the usage guide
Are you sure to uninstall this plugin?
The current installation cannot be overrode, please uninstall then reinstall.
The su Enabler plugin has been deprecated, now you don\'t need to install the su plugin. You can directly enable su API support in the Engine Settings of the Profile
Plugin consist of some unstable or non-critical functions.

You can submit issues for feedback either in the Chat Groups in the Settings-About section or on GitHub/Thanox. When providing feedback, please make sure to include the following essential information: 

1. Clear description of the issue with accompanying screenshots or screen recordings. 
2. Log files exported by clicking the button below. 

Both pieces of information are necessary.
Fail to export log, pls grant Storage permission manually and try again
Please reboot for changes to take effect.
Reboot your device to update thanox-core
Allow apps to start from background

When the \"Background task\" feature is enabled, Thanox will perform a process cleanup after the screen is turned off. Allow selected apps to continue running even if the screen is locked, and exclude these apps from one-key boost

You can refine the association start control by making rules. For details, please refer to the novice manual. 

Note: The priority of the rule is greater than all other settings (for example, greening, associated startup list). 

 Tip: Turning off rule checking may save device power.
You can control to retain certain services, usage: KEEP $COMPONENT-NAME \ne.g. KEEP xxx/.XService
Clean the background processes of selected apps when they are cleared from recent tasks
Clean background process on task removed
Add blur effect to recent tasks
Show lock interface before app launch
Light up screen on new notification
Affects selected app. When the app returns to the background, it will automatically stop all services or sets them into idle mode; if any service needs to be excluded, please use custom rules.
Stop service or inactive for bg apps
De-freeze all Smart Freeze apps and remove them from the Smart Freeze list. Are you sure you want to do this?
Temporarily de-freeze all apps in the Smart Freeze list, are you sure you want to do this?
Will de-freeze all disabled or suspended apps on your device, including all installed or system apps, are you sure you want to do this?
De-Freeze app on Activity Launch request
Enable \"DOL\" while app has been added to Smart Freeze list
Auto disable apps according to the profile
Note: app freeze makes use of built-in feature of Android. This means that even if Thanox is uninstalled, these effects will still remain.
Create a shortcut stub apk, you can install this app to as a workaround of the launcher icon for disabling apps
This feature works only if Adaptive battery is enabled @Android Pie+.
Also add these Apps to current Package Set?

App clone is implemented based on the Android multi-user mechanism. To enable the App clone, thanox will create a user Profile. Usually, a "Work" tab will be displayed on the Launcher. 
This feature is currently experimental and not yet stable. 

Do you want to enable it?
Will delete all the data of the app clone user and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to disable app clone?
Are you sure you want to uninstall %s? The data of cloned app will be deleted and cannot be recovered
Hide SIM info, serial id etc. please enable Xposed installer scope for selected app
Background process will be cleared if screen is locked

Warning: this setting is a dangerous setting. Inexperienced users should not experiment with this option. \nTo prevent fatal system errors due to misuse, Thanox maintains a global whitelist by default, containing some of the system\'s core applications such as components, phones, media, etc.\n If you strongly prefer not to enable this list, please turn off this option
Put system apps into white lists

Thanox is starting boot logs, permission access logs and hidden logs. This data will be saved into files in real-time, which may speed up power consumption. It is recommended to enable power-saving mode on demand.
Alert when highly power-consuming apps are detected
Stop recording app start, ops accessing, privacy data access to save battery as much as possible
Backup thanox settings to external storage
Restore thanox settings from external file. If it fails, you can try to delete dir /data/system/thanos/ manually, or you can try to set the dir owner to 1000

When you enable the feature that relies on the Xposed scope for the app, Thanox will automatically request the Scope. Please pay attention to the system notification \nAttention, this feature depends on the latest version of the LSPosed framework \nPlease also check the system settings and the Thanox settings, allowing Thanox bg start
Backup component settings, include Activity, Service, Receiver, Content Provider enable disable settings
Restore success, please reboot for changes to take effect
Not set, won\'t mock this field
Delay clean up after screen is locked
Do not clean up audio streams
Totally hide content of the task, instead of blur
Set force exclude or include recent task for this app
Force app dialog to be cancelable for, please enable Xposed installer scope for this app
Prevent this app to be kill by LMK
Override app notification with custom Title and Text
Turn off all sensor when app is in foreground
When enabled, apps in the foreground will not be cleaned up
Display notification when pending clean up process detected

In some cases, your device might no longer boot after installing Thanox.

If you never heard about "soft brick" and "bootloop" before or if you don't know how to recover from such a situation, do NOT install Thanox!

In any case, having a recent backup is highly recommended.
Only show those of current app
Freeze all apps on screen off
Show toast tip when freeze or unfreeze app
If this switch is enabled, Thanox will block PACKAGE CHANGED event for this package, so Launch apps will not be able to detect the package enable event.
By default we freeze package by disabling package. If this switch is on we will use suspend instead of disable to package freeze it
By default, Thanox will freeze apps when it stopped running, task removed. \nThanox will freeze all apps during device booting up, process clean up. \nYou can also choose additional settings below.

Applications in the background usually have services or processes that remain active, and these services or processes have their own purpose. Unfortunately, our users may not know exactly what these services and processes do.\n\nYou can pick an interference method for the applications that return to the background. It is worth mentioning that some apps may not work correctly after interfering with them.
This will attempt to stop all services that is not in the KEEP rule list
This will attempt to unbind all services that is not in the KEEP rule list
Would not interfere applications with notifications
Attempts to set the app to idle state. This is based on Android\'s default standby mechanism.

Turning on this switch will prevent services that have been stopped from restarting in the background. Note that these blocking events will also appear in the blocking log in the background startup interface

Thanox support both Xposed and Magisk.

 For Xposed user, you can just select and check Thanox in Xposed app module config page. 

For Magisk user, you can rename downloaded Thanox apk from .apk to .zip and then install in Magisk manager, or if you can not find the downloaded apk, we also have option to export the patch zip to local external storage.
1. Select and check Thanox in Xposed Manager \n2. Reboot and enjoy \n3. Remember, after every update, re-check thanox in Xposed manager and reboot!

1. Thanox apk is also the magisk module, just rename it to zip \n2. You can also export magisk module from Settings-About-Patch info \n3. Remember, after every update, also update magisk module in Magisk manager and reboot!
You can track our pre-release on \nGithub/Thanox
Thanox currently supports two activation methods: Xposed patch or Magisk patch (experimental, supports Android11+); you can choose one of them to explore.
You can find the instructions on the homepage of the settings. It is strongly recommended that you spend more time looking at these instructions. Maybe it will help you.
Device admin of Thanox Infinite Z profile.

PM disable is a function provided by the Android system that can \"disable\" an application; when using this method to \"freeze\" an application, the desktop icon of the frozen application will disappear. You may create a shortcut or proxy app to launch it directly from Launcher.

Suspend is a function provided by Android for DPC management; the suspended application usually retains a gray icon at Launcher, but the activities of the application cannot be started directly, and a dialog usually pops up indicating that the application has been restricted from use by the Administrator. You can turn on the \"DOL\" switch for the app, which will cause Thanox to unfreeze the app when it detects a request to launch the activity.
View System Settings write and read records. Usually you should select the Settings, Settings Provider, and the Secure Manager app in Xposed scope.
%s wants to launch %s, do you allow?
"This service is started by its application. Stopping the service may render the app inoperable."
"The app cannot be stopped safely. If you stop forcibly, some of your current work may be lost."
"This is the old app process, still running, just in case. Stopping is usually not recommended."
"%1$s: currently in use. Tap Settings to manage it."
"Do you want to stop system service?"
"If you stop this service, some features on your phone will also stop working and will not work until you turn your phone off and on again."
"See how much storage an app is using"
灭屏后冻结列表里的应用
当你从最近任务移除应用时冻结该应用
灭屏后强行停止列表里的应用
当你从最近任务移除应用时强行停止该应用
为了更好地为您服务，Thanos 是一款需要订阅的付费软件。请点击下方的订阅按钮查看详细的订阅说明。\n\n如果您已经是 Thanox 或 Thanox Pro 的付费用户，无需再次订阅 Thanos。您可以在订阅页面使用 Thanox 激活码或通过 Play 商店验证您的资格。
正在通过谷歌Play检查应用许可
1. 请检查你的设备网络情况，确保可以正常访问谷歌Play商店 \n2. 请检查你的谷歌服务框架，确保其处于启用状态 \n3. 请检查你的谷歌账号是否正确登录
Donated to get Premium to unlock this feature.\n\nTips: Try it out first, feel it is available and satisfied, and then purchase the advanced features~
感谢支持%1$s 你也可以去捐赠页面点击，每天都可以哦！
领取口令已经复制到剪贴板
验证成功，请妥善保存你的激活码，不要对外扩散，否则可能会被禁用，后续换机或者刷机后可以继续使用
